resources.name: JLPT Official Website
resources.nameJa: 日本語能力試験公式サイト
resources.description: Official JLPT information and sample questions.
resources.descriptionLong: The official Japanese Language Proficiency Test website provides essential information about the exam, including test dates, registration, and official sample questions. A must-visit resource for anyone planning to take the JLPT.
resources.notes: Check for official sample questions and test format information.

resources.name: Nihongo-Pro JLPT Practice
resources.description: Free JLPT practice tests for all levels.
resources.descriptionLong: Nihongo-Pro offers free JLPT practice tests covering all sections and levels. The tests simulate the actual exam format and provide instant feedback. Great for assessing your readiness for the real test.
resources.notes: Good for practice but not official questions.

resources.name: JLPT Boot Camp
resources.description: JLPT study guides and practice materials.
resources.descriptionLong: JLPT Boot Camp provides comprehensive study guides, vocabulary lists, and practice materials for all JLPT levels. The site includes tips for each section of the test and strategies for effective preparation.
resources.priceDetails: Free content available. Premium courses for purchase.

resources.name: Todai JLPT Practice
resources.descriptionLong: Todai offers JLPT-focused reading practice with articles categorized by difficulty level. The app includes vocabulary support and is great for building reading comprehension skills needed for the test.
resources.priceDetails: Free tier available. Premium for full access.

resources.name: Shin Kanzen Master N5
resources.descriptionLong: Shin Kanzen Master is one of the most thorough JLPT preparation series available. The N5 books cover grammar, vocabulary, reading, and listening with detailed explanations and extensive practice questions.
resources.notes: Separate books for each skill. Very thorough.

resources.name: Shin Kanzen Master N4
resources.descriptionLong: Shin Kanzen Master N4 continues the series with materials for the N4 level. The books provide in-depth coverage of all test sections with practice questions that match the exam format.

resources.name: Shin Kanzen Master N3
resources.descriptionLong: Shin Kanzen Master N3 provides thorough preparation for the intermediate N3 level. The series covers the increased complexity of grammar and vocabulary required at this level.
resources.notes: N3 is a significant step up in difficulty.

resources.name: Shin Kanzen Master N2
resources.descriptionLong: Shin Kanzen Master N2 is considered essential for N2 preparation. The books cover advanced grammar patterns, extensive vocabulary, and challenging reading passages needed for this level.

resources.name: Shin Kanzen Master N1
resources.descriptionLong: Shin Kanzen Master N1 prepares learners for the highest level of the JLPT. The books cover sophisticated grammar, nuanced vocabulary, and complex reading comprehension required for N1.
resources.notes: The gold standard for N1 preparation.

resources.name: Nihongo So-matome N5
resources.description: Daily study JLPT N5 preparation books.
resources.descriptionLong: Nihongo So-matome provides a structured daily study approach to JLPT preparation. The N5 books organize content into manageable daily lessons, making it easy to maintain a consistent study schedule.
resources.notes: Good for learners who prefer structured daily study.

resources.name: TRY! JLPT N5
resources.nameJa: TRY! 日本語能力試験 N5
resources.description: Grammar-focused N5 preparation with clear explanations.
resources.descriptionLong: TRY! is a JLPT preparation series known for its clear grammar explanations. The N5 book covers all grammar points needed for the test with example sentences and practice exercises.

resources.name: JLPT Taisaku
resources.description: Online JLPT practice questions and mock tests.
resources.descriptionLong: JLPT Taisaku offers online practice questions and mock tests for all JLPT levels. The platform provides immediate feedback and tracks your progress over time.
resources.priceDetails: Free questions available. Premium for full tests.

resources.name: JTest4You
resources.description: Free JLPT practice tests and vocabulary lists.
resources.descriptionLong: JTest4You provides free JLPT practice tests, vocabulary lists, and grammar explanations for all levels. The site includes thousands of practice questions to help prepare for the exam.

resources.name: Bunpro JLPT Grammar
resources.descriptionLong: Bunpro organizes Japanese grammar by JLPT level, making it easy to study exactly what you need for your target level. The SRS system ensures you review grammar points at optimal intervals.
resources.notes: Excellent for systematic grammar study by JLPT level.

resources.name: Anki JLPT Decks
resources.description: Community-created JLPT vocabulary decks for Anki.
resources.descriptionLong: The Anki community has created numerous JLPT-focused vocabulary decks. Popular decks include Core 2k/6k/10k and level-specific vocabulary lists. Using SRS with these decks is highly effective for vocabulary retention.
resources.notes: Search for decks specific to your target JLPT level.
